customerSituation: The customer recently got married and needs to change their last name on their driving license.
desiredOutcome: To update the customer's last name on their driving license to reflect their new married name.
steps: Customer needs to fill out the D1 application form for car/motorcycle licenses.
Include original documents confirming new name like marriage certificate.
Since customer lost their old license, include a £20 fee payable to DVLA.
resolution: The agent was able to provide the customer with the steps and requirements for changing their name on their driving license after getting married, including the £20 fee for a lost license. While frustrated by the fee, the customer understood the process.
